name: White Wooden Chair
description: A classic white wooden chair, perfect for any dining room or kitchen. Its simple design and sturdy construction make it a timeless piece.

name: Pink Velvet Chair
description: Luxurious pink velvet chair with comfortable cushioning and stylish design. This statement piece will add a touch of elegance to any room.

name: Orange Chair
description: A vibrant orange chair that adds a pop of color to your space. Its modern design and comfortable seat make it perfect for relaxing or entertaining guests.

name: White Tufted Chair
description: Elegant white tufted chair with a classic design. This chair is perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to your living room or bedroom.

name: Brown Swivel Chair
description: Comfortable brown swivel chair perfect for home offices or living rooms. Its adjustable height and swivel function provide optimal comfort and flexibility.

name: Brown Upholstered Chair
description: Stylish brown upholstered chair with a sleek design. This chair is perfect for adding a modern touch to your dining room or living area.

name: Black Chair with Pillow
description: Modern black chair with a comfortable pillow. This chair is perfect for relaxing after a long day or enjoying a good book.

name: Simple White Chair
description: A simple and versatile white chair that complements any decor. Its lightweight design makes it easy to move around and its sturdy construction ensures durability.
